Get a paginated list of user groups with optional search and sorting

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Search term to filter user groups by name","in":"query","name":"search","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Page number, starting from 1","in":"query","name":"page","schema":{"type":"integer","default":1}},{"description":"Number of items per page","in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"type":"integer","default":10}},{"description":"Column to sort by","in":"query","name":"sort_column","schema":{"type":"string","default":"\"name\""}},{"description":"Sort direction (asc or desc)","in":"query","name":"sort_direction","schema":{"type":"string","default":"\"asc\""}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
